page.title: 01Milford on Sea Hordle Cliff
page.content: Cornwallis Road, Milford on Sea to Barton on Sea. Most of the area is sea (Bournemouth Bay) and beach - mostly shingle. Cliff top with gorse and 2 car parks. to the North of the B3058 is an Old Peoples Home a few private houes ad many unattractive blocks of flats. To the North is a small residential area, of mostly retired people, then the pleasure grounds through which flows Danes Street.Carvan parks and holiday chalet area. Studland Common with wooded area beyond. Continuing along the cliff to the West is Hordle House Co-ed preparatory school with kingergarten. The grave yard of Hordel Parish Church (1180-1830) A pill box on hill top and 2 remaining Tank Traps 81940) at Taddiford Gap. To North are Hordle Manor, Taddiford and Becton Farms. Arable and grazing.
